encyclopedia.content: POD 卸货港 port of delivery（POD）, port of discharge（POD）, 卸货港POD 交付凭证 Proof of Delivery 交付凭证 P.O.D.乐队 是美国90年代诞生的众多另类金属乐队中成立较早，也是比较有影响力，并且在商业上也一直有着相对不错表现的一支乐队，他们一直坚持硬核，重金属和说唱相结合的音乐风格。P.O.D.最早成立于1992年，P.O.D.的意思就是Payable onDeath的简称。吉他手Marcos和鼓手Wuv从小就是邻居，并且一起长大，两人都对音

entry.def: A pod is a seed container that grows on plants such as peas or beans.

means.word_mean: 1. the vessel that contains the seeds of a plant (not the seeds themselves)
2. a several-seeded dehiscent fruit as e.g. of a leguminous plant
4. a detachable container of fuel on an airplane
1. take something out of its shell or pod;

sentences.en: I had never met his brother before but I recognized him immediately because they’re as like as two peas in a pod.
